Title: WINJS CTK (Control Toolkit)
Description: WinJS Control kit is a set of custom WINJS controls that are not supported by Windows 8.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The WinJS Control toolkit(WinJSCtk) is a set of custom WinJS UI Controls.

Currently the following controls are supported

Expander



for more info goto Expander

NumericBox



for more info goto NumericBox

helpers
  1. Custom Animations : slide

Controls in progress
  1. Accordion
  2. Slider
  3. Charts
